title: How to Cancel a Recurring Payment in PayPal

steps.title: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser. If you're not automatically logged in, click on Log In in the upper-right corner of the window and enter your credentials.

steps.title: Click on .
steps.content: Click on . This is the Settings icon in the upper-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Click on the Payments tab.
steps.content: Click on the Payments tab. It's near the top-center of the window.

steps.title: Click on Manage pre-approved payments.
steps.content: Click on Manage pre-approved payments . It's in the center of the window.

steps.title: Click on the payment you'd like to cancel.
steps.content: Click on the payment you'd like to cancel. You may need to click on Next Page in the bottom-right corner of the window to find the payment you're looking for if you have multiple recurring payments.

steps.title: Click on Cancel.
steps.content: Click on Cancel . It's next to "Status" under "Billing Details."

steps.title: Click on Yes to confirm.
steps.content: Click on Yes to confirm. This confirms the cancellation of the recurring payment.
